table.name: vtiger_processflow
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_processflow` ( `processflowid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `processflowname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `processflow_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `process_flow_start_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `process_flow_end_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `processmasterid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pf_termination` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `learner_mode` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `pf_termination_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `pf_assignee` text, `strain_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `raw_materials` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `end_product_category` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `operating_mode` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pf_description` text, `pf_witness_one` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `pf_witness_one_signature` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `pf_witness_two` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `pf_witness_two_signature` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `pf_process_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pf_project_id` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `pf_completion_notification` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`processflowid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_processflowcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_processflowcf` ( `processflowid` int(11) NOT NULL, `cf_2243` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`processflowid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
